body.p:
State of Ohio
Hamilton Co } ss

Wm P. Mellen of the City of Cincinnati in said county & state, being duly sworn says that he will well and truly execute and perform all his duties as Commissioner of Deeds for the state of Kentucky resident in said city & county in the state of Ohio, according to the best of his skill & judgment

State of Ohio
Hamilton County } ss:

I Ethan A Brown a Notary Public within and for the county of Hamilton and state of Ohio, and duly commissioned as such do hereby certify, that William. P. Mellen. appeared before me in my office in the city of Cincinnati in said county and state; and being by me duly sworn made oath to the above affidavit and subscribed the same in my presence --
In testimony whereof I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my Notarial Seal this sixteenth day of March AD 1861 --

Ethan A Brown --
Notary Public.
Hamilton County Ohio --

Ohio
Oath of Wm P. Mellen
Comr. of Deeds
Filed Mar 18 1861
